001package Calibration_Plugins_2;
002
003import ij.IJ;
004import ij.ImagePlus;
005import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
006import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
007import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.data.CalibrationImage;
008import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.data.ZhangData;
009import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Camera;
010import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.ViewTransform;
011import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
012import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
013import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
014import imagingbook.common.math.Matrix;
015import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
016
017import java.awt.Shape;
018import java.awt.geom.Line2D;
019
020import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.splitLines;
021
022
023/**
024 * This plugin draws the projected X/Y/Z coordinate axes for each of the given camera views.
025 *
026 * @author WB
027 * @version 2022/12/19
028 */
029public class Draw_3D_Axes_Demo implements PlugIn {
030        
031        private static ImageResource resource = CalibrationImage.CalibImageStack;
032        private static BasicAwtColor xColor = BasicAwtColor.Red;
033        private static BasicAwtColor yColor = BasicAwtColor.Green;
034        private static BasicAwtColor zColor = BasicAwtColor.Blue;
035        private static double StrokeWidth = 2.0;
036        private static double AxisLength = 5;
037        private static boolean FlipYaxis = true;
038
039        public void run(String arg0) {
040
041                // create a 3D model:
042                double[] p0 = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}; // 3D origin
043                double[] p1 = {AxisLength, 0.0, 0.0};   // x-axis
044                double[] p2 = {0.0, AxisLength, 0.0};   // y-axis
045                double[] p3 = {0.0, 0.0, AxisLength};   // z-axis
046                if (FlipYaxis) {
047                        Matrix.multiplyD(-1, p2);
048                }
049
050                // open the test image (stack):
051                ImagePlus testIm = resource.getImagePlus();
052                if (testIm == null) {
053                        IJ.error("Could not open calibration images!");
054                        return;
055                }
056                testIm.show();
057
058                if (!runDialog()) {
059                        return;
060                }
061
062                // get pre-calculated camera intrinsics and view parameters (typically by calibration):
063                Camera camera = ZhangData.getCameraIntrinsics();
064                ViewTransform[] views = ZhangData.getAllViewTransforms();
065                final int M = views.length;
066
067                // project and draw the model into the views:
068                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
069                ColoredStroke xStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, xColor.getColor());
070                ColoredStroke yStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, yColor.getColor());
071                ColoredStroke zStroke = new ColoredStroke(StrokeWidth, zColor.getColor());
072
073                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
074                        ola.setStackPosition(i + 1);    // stack slice number
075                        ola.addShape(get3DAxisProjection(camera, views[i], p0, p1), xStroke);
076                        ola.addShape(get3DAxisProjection(camera, views[i], p0, p2), yStroke);
077                        ola.addShape(get3DAxisProjection(camera, views[i], p0, p3), zStroke);
078                }
079
080                testIm.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
081        }
082
083        private Shape get3DAxisProjection(Camera cam, ViewTransform V, double[] P1, double[] P2) {
084                double[] u1 = cam.project(V, P1);
085                double[] u2 = cam.project(V, P2);
086                return new Line2D.Double(u1[0], u1[1], u2[0], u2[1]);
087        }
088
089        // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
090
091        private boolean runDialog() {
092                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
093                gd.setInsets(0, 0, 0);
094                gd.addMessage(splitLines(40,
095                                "This plugin displays the 5 sample view images and",
096                                "projects the 3D coordinate axis onto the origin of ",
097                                "the calibration model, based on the pre-calculated",
098                                "calibration data. No calibration is performed!"));
099
100                gd.addNumericField("Stroke width", StrokeWidth);
101                gd.addEnumChoice("X-coordinate color", xColor);
102                gd.addEnumChoice("Y-coordinate color", yColor);
103                gd.addEnumChoice("Z-coordinate color", zColor);
104                gd.addNumericField("3D axis length (inches)", AxisLength, 1);
105                gd.addCheckbox("Flip y-axis", FlipYaxis);
106
107                gd.showDialog();
108                if (gd.wasCanceled())
109                        return false;
110
111                StrokeWidth = gd.getNextNumber();
112                xColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
113                yColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
114                zColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
115                AxisLength = gd.getNextNumber();
116                FlipYaxis = gd.getNextBoolean();
117                return true;
118        }
119
120}
